span.content: Access to Free Meals During School Closure 3/18/20

div.div: Access to Free Meals During School Closure 3/18/20

div.p: The International Leadership Charter High School is committed to facilitating the information and access to free meals for students and families in need during this time of school closure.

Our Director of Parent and Community Engagement has partnered with the PS/MS 37 to ensure that International Leadership students and families in need can access free breakfast and lunch while our school is closed . See below for details. In addition, families living in the Inwood and Fordham communities can find free food and carry out meals at the below locations.

La escuela preparatoria International Leadership Charter High School se compromete a facilitar la información y el acceso a comidas gratuitas para los estudiantes y las familias necesitadas durante este tiempo de cierre de la escuela.

Nuestro Director de Participación de Padres y Comunidad se ha asociado con la escuela PS / MS 37 para garantizar que los estudiantes de Liderazgo Internacional y las familias necesitadas puedan acceder a desayuno y almuerzo gratis mientras nuestra escuela está cerrada. Además, las familias que viven en las comunidades de Inwood y Fordham pued en encontrar comida gratis y realizar comidas en los siguientes lugares.

p.strong: Free Meals for Students and Families:

p.br:
360 w 230 th St. Bronx, NY 10463 (Marble Hill)
(718) 796 - 0360 EGonzalez@ilchs.org
Serves free breakfast and lunch to International Leadership students and families from 8:30 am to 1:30 pm, Monday - Friday through April 20. Families can take breakfast and lunch with them to go at the same time between 8:30 am to 1:30 pm.
Sirve desayuno y almuerzo gratis a estudiantes y familias de Liderazgo Intern acional de 8:30 a.m. a 1:30 p.m., de lunes a viernes hasta el 20 de abril. Las familias pueden tomar el desayuno y el almuerzo con ellos a la misma hora entre las 8:30 a.m. 1: 30 pm.

2759 Webster Avenue
Bronx, New York 10458
(Fordham neighborhood) (718) 220 - 4892
Open 7 Days a week 12:30 PM to 3:30 PM
Their Facebook Page has confirmed they are still handing out meals to go.

2345 University Ave.
The Bronx, NY 10468
(West of Fordham Manor)
Wednesday 9am – 2pm
(718) 933 - 6935
Confirmed Food Pantry Open

399 Mosholu Pkwy
The Bronx , NY 10467
(Just north of the Bronx Botanical Garden)
(646) 294 - 7726
Monday 12:00 - 2:00 PM Wednesday 10:30 – 1:00 PM
Confirmed they will remain open

Jerome Avenue Bronx, NY 10468
(Kingsbridge Heights)
Tuesdays 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM
They will remain open next Tuesday 718 - 220 - 8124

(Near Inwood Hill)
MMM Food Pantry
148 Post Ave, New York, NY 10034
Open Saturdays beginning March 28, 9 A.M
Closed on Saturday, March 21
(646) 545-7696

650 Academy St.
New York, NY 10034
(212) 567-9162
Confirmed that they are serving breakfast & lunch for students
Monday-Friday 7:30 AM-1:30 PM.

148 Post Avenue Manhattan NY 10034 (Inwood)
(646) 545 - 7696
Closed this Saturday.<
Hope to Re - open
For Saturday 3/28
Call to confirm

104 Cooper Street
Manhattan, NY 10034
(Inwood)
Saturday 8:00AM - 10:30AM
(212) 567 - 1300
They appear to be temporarily closed
Call for updates
